thread.section_title: Hotel Keppler - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Top notch service
thread.title_full: Top notch service - Review of Hotel Keppler, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Evan G
title: Top notch service
text: This place was incredible - I felt that I was getting a great value for my money. Very much a luxury boutique feel without spending too much over the top. The staff was incredibly welcoming and helpful. The service was way above par, one example I remember was the breakfast staff remembering who had what beverages, our names, and our room number after just the first time we sat for breakfast. Awesome place with awesome staff!!
